high_descs: Turn to your left and go to the desk in front of you.
Pick up the white coffee cup, between the computer and the lamp, on the desk.
Move over to your right so that you are at the right end of the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the front, right corner of the desk.
pick up the white mug from the desk
step back slightly to continue to face desk
turn on desk lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: turn on a desk lamp with a mug in hand

high_descs: Turn to your left and walk to the desk.
Pick up the white mug sitting behind the blue pencil between the laptop and the lamp.
Move to your right and stand in front of the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a mug from the desk, turn on the lamp
